snippet: The World Cup leader Peter Prevc of Slovenia soared 136 meters (446 feet) in the second heat to win the second leg of the ski jumping Four Hills Tour in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany, as the competition headed for the final two events in Austria.
lead_paragraph: The World Cup leader Peter Prevc of Slovenia soared 136 meters (446 feet) in the second heat to win the second leg of the ski jumping Four Hills Tour in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany, as the competition headed for the final two events in Austria.
